Scenario 2021 with: Detailed Cavern, MB4Shield and Muon overlaps fixed

#### PR description:

Scenario 2021 with: Detailed Cavern, MB4 Neutron Shields (YB+2, YB-2, S4 S13) and Overlaps, inside the Muon System, fixed

#### PR validation:

Test ok with cmsShow (there are 188 overlaps in CALO, TRACKER, FORWARDSHIELD)
